channel.title: Arguments for my statement + shizzle about mexicans
channel.description:
Well, I have to have a presentation tomorrow and I need some arguments for my statement. I have quite a few but I need more, because you never know. My statement is that the Americans should leave Iraq. So does anyone has a few arguments for me?
Thanks in advance.
Edit: I have to make something else too. Do you know any pro's and con's about the immigration of Mexicans to the U.S, for both Mexico and the U.S.
Pro's U.S: Cheaper workers Con's U.S: Cheaper workers mean less work for native Americans.
Pro's Mexico: Con's Mexico: Braindrain.
I need quite a few, so help again please :P

item.title: Arguments for my statement + shizzle about mexicans
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Thanks alot, I’ve added another question. BTW, wasnt Bush sr. the president in the time of the first/second Gulf war?

Read full topic

item.title: Arguments for my statement + shizzle about mexicans
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

There was no reason for us going into Iraq in the first place. Al-Qaeda wasn’t even a unified group until we stepped foot in Iraq. The search for WMD’s was based on lies, which by all rights, Cheney and Bush should be impeached for. Yet they aren’t, while Clinton was getting a bad rep because of a blow job. That’s democracy. That’s how fucking stupid Americans are.

Read full topic
